channel.description: Recent content in tools on Notes

item.title: GIT notes
item.description: Definitions What is the difference between git and github? What is upstream and origin when forking in Github?

item.title: Latex setup in Emacs
item.description: Emacs is by far the most advanced LaTeX editor that I have used. Why? It makes things easier and more enjoyable.

item.title: Paraview notes
item.description: Notes about paraview. Concepts Sources Algorithms with no input, just output. Reading a file for instance. Sinks Algorithms with multiple inputs but no output.

item.title: One liners commands
item.description: tree -L 1 Show tree directory up to the first level. -d show only the directory. Needs the tree package.

item.title: mpFEM notes
item.description: Questions Solver params how to specify preconditioners scaling L,R,T? just number to multiply? Singularity sandbox, is like a container with the folder structure accessible

item.title: Programming notes
item.description: Documentation Architecture decision records title status context decision consequence

item.title: PETSc notes
item.description: What is PETSc? Portable, extensible toolkit for Scientific computation. It is a collection of data structures and routines for implementing applications for solving partial differential equations numerically.

item.title: Trilinos notes
item.description: Basics What is Trilinos? Object oriented framework for solving math and engineering problems (linear system of equations). Can solve problems up to 2 billion unknowns.

item.title: System notes
item.description: Intro Log of my system configuration for windows. Current machine <2021-05-24 Mon>: Thinkpad t14s Ryzen PRO 5 (6 cores).

item.title: Emacs Notes
item.description: Introduction Build emacs inside windows subsystem for linux (wsl). The main advantage is that emacs is considerably faster when using LSP.
